pages.text: $(lunar)Lunar Blade$()$(br)A swift sword that deals bonus damage at night. Right-click for a mana-powered dash attack.
$(stellar)Meteor Hammer$()$(br)A heavy weapon that creates shockwaves on impact. Right-click to slam the ground.
$(stellar)Stardust Dagger$()$(br)A fast dagger that teleports you behind enemies on backstab.
$(stellar)Meteorite Greatsword$()$(br)A massive sword with sweeping attacks that hit multiple enemies.
